name: Galaxy Shooter Classic: Guardians Space on Fire
name_original: Galaxy Shooter Classic: Guardians Space on Fire
description:
While saving the Universe from countless enemies, you have ended up in the asteroid belt located between the orbits of Mars and Jupiter. You need to survive and pass through it so that you can save your friends who badly need your help.

In this extreme shooter, the number of asteroids and the fire intensity will constantly increase. As the game progresses, you will be able to hone your modern destroyers and increase their deadly power.

Very powerful bosses will bar your way but you shouldn't be afraid of them. Boldly challenge them to a deadly combat.

Millions of players have already tried accomplishing this incredible mission but only a select few have succeeded!
